name: Entropy (itch) (University of Chester Games Development)
description:
You wake up as a captain of an abandoned ship with no memory of what happened to your crew. You are befriended by the ships AI IVA who offers to help. The player soon learns that they must escape the abandoned ship. Do you think you can successfully escape the ship?

UNIVERSITY OF CHESTER PROJECT DETAILS

Entropy was developed by 3 students over the course of the academic year for a collaborative games development second year module. They were given the brief to create an escape the room style game.  Students were unfamiliar with Unity when the project began.

CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • E to interact

REQUIREMENTS

  • Windows
  • Mouse and keyboard

TEAM MEMBERS

3 x Level 5 Students

COURSE DETAILS

The work presented here is that of our students. Although the page is run by the University of Chester, views in the games do not necessarily represent those of the University of Chester.
